name: Logo
description: A ready to use Logo component with the needed SVGs.

props.name: svg
props.doc: Provide a custom SVG to render instead of the built-in logos. Accepts a React SVG component or element. Width, height and color props still apply.

props.name: brand
props.doc: Define which brands logo to show. `ui` (DNB) or `sbanken`. Defaults to `ui`.

props.name: variant
props.doc: Define the logo variant, if there is more than one variant of a brands logo. Currently the only option other than default is `compact` and `compactHorizontal` variant of the Sbanken logo. Defaults to `default`.

props.name: color
props.doc: Define the color of the logo.

props.name: inheritColor
props.doc: Set to `true` if you do not want to inherit the color by `currentColor`. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: inheritSize
props.doc: Set to `true` if you want to inherit the size of the parent. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: width
props.doc: Define the width of the logo.

props.name: height
props.doc: Define the height of the logo.
